column4: I know this might be a dumb question but i was wondering as I am or should say was a windows mindless drone not any more but was wondering was there services that are not needed  at start kinda like shutting this off in msconfig  kinda like that and if so what is needed and was is not ?
if you're looking for speed, you could try compiling a custom kernel
make sure to fully back up your stuff first though
if you haven't already, try turning off visual effects
